name: Verify Side Door Opening by Door Mesh Click
description: Validates that side doors can be opened by clicking directly on the door mesh instead of the button.
testObjective: Ensure door interaction accepts both button and mesh clicks.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Navigate to a side door in the hallway
steps.expected: Side door is visible and closed

steps.action: Click [LMB] directly on the door mesh (not the button)
Try clicking the door mesh again
steps.expected: Door interaction responds (may be defect if door closes)

postconditions: Door state changes based on interaction
